Compatible with iOS 8, 9, 10 and 11.

SmoothKeyBoard is my new Tweak that gives you the visual option to make Sleek and Smoother the KeyBoard on the HomeScreen.

It simply renders the KeyBoard White and the Shift Keys Shiny.

No Respring Needed for enabling and disabling the Tweak.

Feel free to contact me via Mail or via Twitter @CydiaGeek, i hope you like it, thanks! :)

Configure options from Settings.

Version 1.0.9 - Added the option to Remove on System Wide the One Handed Keyboard Feature when Holding the Keyboard Globe Button (included My Tweak OneHandedKeyboardLESS on My Repo). - Added the option to Remove on System Wide the Keyboard Settings Button Feature from the Globe Button List (credit to A_H_Rabie). Version 1.0.8
- Added the option to Enable Sleek Light Keyboard (tip by charlie666).
